what-about.heading: What about Matthew?
what-about.paragraph: Matthew is a technically sophisticated Front End Developer who excels at  creating clean, readable, and testable software solutions to rapidly evolving business problems. Matthew has a proven record of building, deploying, and maintaining complex web applications and architectures in a variety of platforms. Currently, he specializes in React.Js, Next.Js, JavaScript and NodeJS/ExpressJS with an emphasis on client-side development using React.Js. In his spare time, Matthew enjoys playing and recording music, writing, and cooking.

quotes: Matt is a highly skilled frontend engineer. He was our teams go to for ensuring our components matched the designs our UX gave us and in a way that was intuitive and responsive. He ensured our site was developed with a focus on accessibility and enforced our mobile first design process.
Aside from development, Matt would also do many behind the scenes tasks even taking over for our EM when our EM went on paternity leave.
Overall Matt would make an amazing edition to any team.
I worked with Matt for the past 4 months and I found that he is an outstanding front-end engineer who excels in time management and delivery.

He is an expert in React and JavaScript and consistently delivers high-quality projects. He has excellent communication skills and works well in a team environment, he is so polite and a dedicated professional.

He brings creative solutions and is always willing to share ideas to solve problems. In general, Matt would be an excellent addition as a front-end engineer who can work well in a team, consistently deliver high-quality work, and possess exceptional hard and soft skills.
cited-by.colleague-from: · UX Designer · UI Designer · Product Designer · Research · TechnologyUX Designer · UI Designer · Product Designer · Research · Technology

quotes: It’s always a pleasure working with Matty. I have been closely working with him on various projects for two years at American Express.
Matty is very dedicated and hardworking who always ensures to give his best in product delivery.
I truly admire him on his exceptional skills especially on React ,NodeJS. Matty mentored me on Various Occasions on react and Node js.

experience.description: Developed a highly-customizable, single-deployment, multi-tenant, direct-to-consumer pet insurance sales app with NextJS/React Typescript and Node.  Spearheaded styling, content, and configuration admin to configure the sales app to match partner branding. Championed schema-driven form library for rapid development of web forms Developed theme-able internal UI component library. Maintained legacy  application leveraged by prospective partners to quickly test integrations with  Boost's APIs.

Developed Green Pasture FIntech UI for Small Businesses application journey between Amazon/American Express primarily in and React/Node for Germany and France markets. Development for Small Business Upgrades Applicants in Japan, Mexico, UK, and Australia markets, primarily in React/Node
